title: THE FUGITIVE 116 The Garden House [retr?tv]
description:
THE FUGITIVE -1x16- THE GARDEN HOUSE  (1/14/1964)

Kimble is working as the caretaker at a spacious ranch in Connecticut which is owned by newspaper heiress Ann Guthrie who lives with her husband Harlan and her sister Ruth. Ann and Ruth&#039;s late father founded the Westborne Clarion, the newspaper that Harlan currently runs. Although Ann is the sole benefactor of her father&#039;s estate, she believes Ruth is entitled to part of the fortune. But Ann is unaware that the greedy Ruth is having an affair with Harlan and they plot to murder Ann and claim everything. When Kimble suspects Ruth and Harlan&#039;s plan and informs Ann, the skeptic heiress refuses to believe him. Knowing that Kimble knows, the crafty couple plot to frame him for Ann&#039;s murder.

Starring David Janssen as Doctor Richard Kimble
Guest star: Robert Webber (Harlan), Pippa Scott (Carol), Peggy McCay (Ann), Hanna Landy (Hannah), Jason Johnson (Police Lieutenant) 
Writer: Sheldon Stark
Director: Ida Lupino
